name: BIQTIris
description: A reference iris image quality algorithm including ISO metrics.

attributes.name: contrast
attributes.description: Raw score quantifying overall image contrast.

attributes.name: iris_diameter
attributes.description: Raw diameter of the iris measured in pixels.

attributes.name: iris_pupil_gs
attributes.description: Raw measure quantifying how distinguishable the boundary is between the pupil and the iris.

attributes.name: iris_sclera_gs
attributes.description: Raw measure quantifying how distinguishable the boundary is between the iris and the sclera.

attributes.name: pupil_circularity_avg_deviation
attributes.description: Average deviation for the dimensionless pupil radii at corresponding angle segments.

attributes.name: pupil_diameter
attributes.description: Raw diameter of the pupil measured in pixels.

attributes.name: quality
attributes.description: An overall quality score that leverages several statistics together.

attributes.name: sharpness
attributes.description: Raw score quantifying the sharpness of the image.

attributes.name: iso_greyscale_utilization
attributes.description: The spread of intensity values regarding the pixel values within the iris portion of the image.

attributes.name: iso_iris_pupil_concentricity
attributes.description: The degree to which the pupil centre and the iris centre are in the same location.

attributes.name: iso_iris_sclera_contrast
attributes.description: The image characteristics at the boundary between the iris region and the sclera.

attributes.name: iso_margin_adequacy
attributes.description: The degree to which the iris portion of the image is centred relative to the edges of the entire image.

attributes.name: iso_pupil_boundary_circularity
attributes.description: The circularity of the iris-pupil boundary.

attributes.name: iso_iris_pupil_contrast
attributes.description: The image characteristics at the boundary between the iris region and the pupil.

attributes.name: iso_iris_pupil_ratio
attributes.description: The degree to which the pupil is dilated or constricted.

attributes.name: iso_sharpness
attributes.description: The degree of focus present in the image.

attributes.name: iso_usable_iris_area
attributes.description: The fraction of the iris portion of the image that is not occluded by eyelids, eyelashes, or specular reflections.

attributes.name: normalized_contrast
attributes.description: Normalized value for 'contrast'.

attributes.name: normalized_iris_diameter
attributes.description: Normalized value for 'iris_diameter'.

attributes.name: normalized_iris_pupil_gs
attributes.description: Normalized value for 'iris_pupil_gs'.

attributes.name: normalized_iris_sclera_gs
attributes.description: Normalized value for 'iris_sclera_gs'.

attributes.name: normalized_iso_usable_iris_area
attributes.description: Normalized value for 'iso_usable_iris_area'.

attributes.name: normalized_sharpness
attributes.description: Normalized value for 'sharpness'.

attributes.name: image_height
attributes.description: Image height measured in pixels.

attributes.name: image_width
attributes.description: Image width measured in pixels.

attributes.name: iris_center_x
attributes.description: The x-coordinate of the iris center in the image.

attributes.name: iris_center_y
attributes.description: The y-coordinate of the iris center in the image.

attributes.name: pupil_center_x
attributes.description: The x-coordinate of the pupil center in the image.

attributes.name: pupil_center_y
attributes.description: The y-coordinate of the pupil center in the image.
